alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Middlesex; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Mercer, central Monmouth and southern Middlesex Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plainsboro Center, or 10 miles northeast of Trenton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Old Bridge, East Brunswick, Manalapan, Princeton, Matawan, Jamesburg, Hightstown, Cranbury, Allentown, Roosevelt, Princeton Meadows, Windsor, Brownville, Dayton, Plainsboro Center, Robertsville, Clearbrook Park, Clarksburg, Edinburg and Yorketown. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8A and 9. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 4 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Gusty winds may come well ahead of any rain.
